sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for extraction of constituents using Soxhlet apparatus.
sections.scope: Applicable to extraction of crude drugs in the Pharmacognosy laboratory.
procedure: Assemble the Soxhlet extraction apparatus properly.
Place the powdered drug in the extraction thimble.
Add suitable solvent to the round bottom flask.
Heat the assembly gently using a heating mantle.
Allow the extraction cycle to continue for the required duration.
After extraction, allow the apparatus to cool.
Collect the extract for further analysis.
sections.precautions: Ensure proper assembly to prevent solvent leakage. Handle hot apparatus carefully.
